## ContractDeployer.deployNFTCollection() method

Deploys a new NFTCollection contract

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  metadata | z.input&lt;typeof NFTCollection.schema.deploy&gt; | the contract metadata |
